info.author: Matthew Lagace
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
UPCDB allows you to use the upcdatabase.org API to get UPC details.

To use:

from upcdb import UPCDB

upcdb = UPCDB('<API KEY>')

upc     = upcdb.get('<UPC')

print upc.name

print upc.description

print upc.valid

print upc.price

print upc.description

print upc.ratingsup

print upc.ratingsdown

print upc.reason

print upc.todict()

info.name: upcdb
info.html_description:
UPCDB allows you to use the upcdatabase.org API to get UPC details.

To use:

from upcdb import UPCDB

upcdb = UPCDB(‘<API KEY>’)

upc = upcdb.get(‘<UPC’)

print upc.name

print upc.description

print upc.valid

print upc.price

print upc.description

print upc.ratingsup

print upc.ratingsdown

print upc.reason

print upc.todict()
